name: Ninja like game
description:
WASD to move 

Space to jump

to wall run you have to jump towards the wall and let go of space and hold "w" if you want to cancel wall run let go of "w" or press space

if you fight with enemy your energy bar will fill up and you can press Shift + Right mouse button to activate ultra mode which then you have 5 ultra attacks with 10 seconds of limit (dashes towards crosshair and slices everything in his way)

to climb the wall run towards the wall jump before you hit the wall and hold "W" and space to climb
